subject: Golf
ADT Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Hours after becoming one of eight qualifiers for the final round of the ADT Championship and its $1 million first prize, Paula Creamer, who has been ill since Wednesday, was admitted to a hospital in Boynton Beach, Fla., with abdominal distress. She will decide early Sunday whether to play.
